text: Burintooda Ballankooda (Yuhuud) yaan u Lacnadnay kana Yeellay Quluubtooda mid Ingagan, iyagoo ka leexin Kalimada meejeeda waxayna halmaameen qayb ka mid wixii lagu waaniyey kamana waydid Xaggooda inaad ku aragtid Khayaamo wax yar mooyee ee iska Cafi iskana Saamax Eebe wuxuu Jecelyahay samo Falayaashee
